support_prompt: Note: Only Bilibili and YouTube videos are supported

state_detail.NoRecord: No OCR record found for this video
state_detail.Queuing: Video is queuing for OCR worker
state_detail.Reserved: An OCR worker has reserved this video for processing
state_detail.PendingDownload: 该视频在识别器的等待下载队列中
state_detail.Downloading: Video is being donwloaded by OCR worker
state_detail.PendingProcess: 该视频在识别器的等待识别队列中
state_detail.Processing: Video is being processed by OCR worker
state_detail.RecordExists: An OCR record exists for this video
state_detail.RecordOutOfDate: An OCR record exists for this video, but the video has been update, re-OCR is required
state_detail.Error: OCR worker exception, please contact admin for help

request_succeed: OCR requested, you can refresh to see current OCR state while waiting.
request_failed: Request failed, either this video has been processed or you are not logged in.
